titleStmt.title: Walter W. Peters to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1726

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: New Orleans, New Orleans Parish, Louisiana

body.p:
New Orleans Nov 10th 1863,
His Excellency T E Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky

Frankfort. Dr Sr. I herewith respectfully beg to apply to Yr Excy. for a re-commission, as Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky, a position I have held for several years here. My present commission expiring on the 26th Instant.
Inclosed you have a certificate of the Hon Jas J. Miller, Mayor of the City to the effect of my Loyalty & fitness etc.
Trusting that your Excelly. will find it compatable with your views & the public interests to accede to my request

I have the honor to be
Yo Obt Sert
Walter W. Peters
